pagetip: Enter all relevant release details here & your connect digital files to a release.
learn:
If you’d like to sell this release you must also go to commerce and enter it as an item before you add the sales element.

Once you’ve added your release info you can then generate and export download codes. You don’t have to have a fulfillment file up yet to generate them but make sure you’ve uploaded it before you start sending those codes out!

You can always change any details - all linked commerce items and elements will automatically reflect the changes.
